message.content:
cs.IR, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.SI, cs.DS 

The paper deals with the task of assigning paper submissions to reviewers, which is a common problem in the field of Information Retrieval (IR) and Artificial Intelligence (AI). The paper also discusses the use of recommender systems for this task, which falls under the sub-category of Machine Learning (cs.LG) and Recommender Systems (cs.IR). Additionally, the paper mentions the use of linear programming-based assignment optimization formulation, which is a common technique in the field of Optimization (cs.DS). Finally, the paper discusses the use of multiple sources of information to learn paper-reviewer preference models, which is a common problem in the field of Social and Information Networks (cs.SI).
